name: Daughter | Mother
description:
The world has become your enemy. At times like this, you can only trust your family. As Mother, you must protect your daughter by fending off any incoming enemies. As Daughter, you must support your mother by scavenging the fallen. You must work together in order to survive!

How to play

1. Use Arrow Keys to move

2. Kill enemies with Mother's gun (Z)

3. Switch to Daughter with (Space)

4. Dash towards enemies as Daughter with (Z)

5. Collect health/ammo from fallen enemies
